title.title: Section Title
title.helper: Optional. Displays instead of the default page title.

use_background.title: Enable Background and Section Padding
use_background.helper: Enables section padding. When enabled, you can add a custom background using the fields below.

scroll_target.title: Scroll Target ID
scroll_target.helper: A valid uri, css id or class to an existing page element. The first valid match will be used. If a uri is provided, the browser address bar will not update.
